    static void playSound​(java.lang.String url)
    Plays sound file (source: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/26305/how-can-i-play-sound-in-java)
    java.util.ArrayList<Cell> update()
    Moves and updates the snake's location accordingly Changes snake body and returns all cells changed Note: Detecting for hitting into a snake directly here is impossible for multi-player since need to first get other snake updates, but checking for out-of-bounds is done directly as it is not dependent on other snakes Thus the tail is directly changed on grid here, but the head is not and requires further handling

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Method Details

    • getHead

      public Cell getHead()

    • update

      public java.util.ArrayList<Cell> update() throws SnakeOutOfBoundsException
      Moves and updates the snake's location accordingly Changes snake body and returns all cells changed Note: Detecting for hitting into a snake directly here is impossible for multi-player since need to first get other snake updates, but checking for out-of-bounds is done directly as it is not dependent on other snakes Thus the tail is directly changed on grid here, but the head is not and requires further handling
      Returns:
      An arraylist of all cells that have been changed/updated
      Throws:
      SnakeOutOfBoundsException

    • isMoving

      public boolean isMoving()

    • keyPressed

      public void keyPressed​(java.awt.event.KeyEvent e)
      Method to handle a key being pressed, changes dx and dy
      Parameters:
      e - KeyEvent of Key Pressed

    • killSnake

      public java.util.ArrayList<Cell> killSnake()
      Returns the whole body of the snake, for when the snake dies, directly updates local grid
      Returns:
      Cells that was of the snake and need to be updated to now be empty

    • playSound

      public static void playSound​(java.lang.String url)
      Plays sound file (source: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/26305/how-can-i-play-sound-in-java)

      public int getScore()
